meanings.definition: An abnormal increase in the number of white blood cells in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with leukocytosis after seeing a high white blood cell count.
meanings.sent2: Leukocytosis can indicate an infection or inflammation in the body.
meanings.sent3: The leukocytosis party in the blood was getting out of control, with too many white blood cells invited.
meanings.sent4: Her leukocytosis was like an army of defenders ready to fight off any invaders.
meanings.sent5: The image of leukocytosis flooding the bloodstream stuck in his mind like a white wave of protection.

meanings.definition: The condition of having an elevated white blood cell count.
meanings.sent1: After the test results, the doctor confirmed the leukocytosis in the patient.
meanings.sent2: Leukocytosis is often a response to an infection or illness.
meanings.sent3: The leukocytosis situation in his body was like having too many guards on duty.
meanings.sent4: In her bloodstream, leukocytosis stood like a vigilant army ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: The concept of leukocytosis was as clear as a bright, white spotlight on the blood cells.
